channel.title: 🏢 Faculty of IT, Monash University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 Faculty of IT, Monash University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: TFS-NeRF: Template-Free NeRF for Semantic 3D Reconstruction of Dynamic Scene
item.description: TFS-NeRF: A template-free neural radiance field efficiently reconstructs semantically separable 3D geometries of dynamic scenes featuring multiple interacting entities from sparse RGB videos.
